channel.title: Tell me what you think, Dragon Scimitar
channel.description:
Basicly this is the HIGH POLY dragon scimitar I made for the FPVregScape 1.1, tell you what you think.
Alright guys, I fixed the handle and I added a leather type material to the handle:
As you can see here, the non subbed version has about 1.5k polygons:
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img825/7527/48670586.png[/img]
And here is the subbed edition, I'd say about 80k polygons:
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img62/8632/73256670.png[/img]
As you see here the model could be even lower but it was adjusted for sub surfing:
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img405/4836/31324085.png[/img]
As you can see the handle is fixed now and it has a different material:
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img43/5939/dragonscimittarcloseup.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://a.imageshack.us/img208/8862/dragonscimitar2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Tell me what you think, Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

HALP OMIGAWD THE WORLD IS A BOX… THE SKY AND GROUND FORM NINTY GREE ANGLE HAAAAALP THE WORLD IS FLAT WE ARE GOING TO FALL OFF COLOMBUS DONT DO IT!!!11!!!11!!!111!!1!

Too shiny in my opinon…add a grip then it would be alright, I love how someone posts a fancy render and everyone goes ‘oooh ahhhh’
SHINY THINGS!

Read full topic

item.title: Tell me what you think, Dragon Scimitar
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

The hilt/handle/pummel are way too shiny. Also, the handle should not be metal. Metal handle would mean if it came in contact with something the blade vibrations would move through your hand.

Read full topic
